Reviews.Title: Great Cables At A Great Price
Reviews.Author: Nylox
Reviews.Content: The cable came promptly and was exactly as described.  At first I was concerned that it may not be of good quality due to it's rather small diameter.  This was not an issue however.  The cable works flawlessly with absolutely no interference or squiggly lines. The picture is absolutely perfect.  I even snagged the cable upon installation and thought for sure I damaged it, but it works flawlessly even after a pretty good tug.  In this particular installation, it was unavoidable to run this cable across and next to power wires.  Still the picture is perfect.One thing to note however:  If you need to split the power lead, you will need to make/buy your own power extension.  This is NOT a typical Siamese cable where you can strip the power wire away from the rest of the cable and run your power from distribution box.  The wires run 3 into 1 single cable and are not separable.I will be buying more of these cables in the future as I replace cameras and original cables in the process.  I wish they also came with a gender changing adapter so they could be used as extension cables also.

Reviews.Title: Low quality
Reviews.Author: Bill Jaffe
Reviews.Content: Not a fan. The slightest bend and the signal is lost. Tangles very easily. Go for the thick high quality stuff instead.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected.
Reviews.Author: Jun
Reviews.Content: RCA male to RCA male (audio or video).BNC male to BNC male (with BCN to RCA male adapters provided).DC 2.1mm male to female.The extension cable works as expected, was a low-cost solution, and shipped faster than cables I ordered from other places.This cable is part of a 155' (100'  ext. cable + 55' camera cable) camera setup to watch my fish pond. Signal is as clear as if the camera were plugged directly into the dvr.The bnc-rca adapters provided were a nice bonus, but I had to purchase rca female-female adapters (I knew before I ordered).Overall, works well, just do your homework before clicking the "order" button.

Reviews.Title: Cable audio y video
Reviews.Author: Alfredo Garcia
Reviews.Content: vaya que si es bueno este cable, realmente vale la pena, el audio es muy claro y el video muy bueno dependiendo de la camara que tengas, no duden en comprarlo.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: fender-bender
Reviews.Content: We have had these in service for over a year now with no issues at all in four seasons. would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Good price and quality
Reviews.Author: tman
Reviews.Content: I was able to  run this cable along one side of my house to connect a camera for my backyard and it worked as it should - no problems what so ever.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 100ft Video Audio Power Cable BNC RCA CCTV Security Surveillance
Reviews.Author: pescador2004
Reviews.Content: I am satisfied is a cable medium quality but for the price is good.I am satisfied is a cable medium quality but for the price is good.

Reviews.Title: work good
Reviews.Author: Neng Vang "Neng2012"
Reviews.Content: Every things working just fine and very long so if you need 100FT this great for you and the price is cheap!

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 100' audio cable
Reviews.Author: Lola M. Villalobos "Lola"
Reviews.Content: There were better than expected after reading some of the reviews.  In fact, they were perfect 4 our job. They r strong/sturdy. Great reception..no interference. We just didn't all those little plugs. Great item & would recommend.  The price was unbelievable. The best price I found.

Reviews.Title: Great Cable for the Money!
Reviews.Author: dwpetersen
Reviews.Content: Cable works great.I liked the BNC connectors for the video.I just used this with my video camera.Fast shipping and came just as described.

Reviews.Title: I like it.  like It.
Reviews.Author: George Larsen
Reviews.Content: It was exactly what I needed to run vedio from outside, boththe 100ft and the150ft worked as expected. And you can't beat the price. thank you George

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Judith A. Walter "Junie B"
Reviews.Content: This cable works flawlessly 24/7.  I use it outdoors to indoors with no weather issues at all. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: BNC cable for Video cameras
Reviews.Author: Carolynn's Amazon
Reviews.Content: Product was as described.  Works perfectly. Product was brand new .  Shipped very fast. Best price I could find on the internet.

Reviews.Title: Video Power Cable
Reviews.Author: Black Eyes "Frosed"
Reviews.Content: I bought two and installed one so far.I like the size for easy handling.The video signal has been stable.I have a microphone to add later.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Brian DeMaris
Reviews.Content: Not real heavy duty.  Not commercial that I would have liked.  Kinda cheap, but OK  Here are five more words, how dumb you guys.

ProductInfo.Features:
Comes with 2 RCA Male to BNC Female adaptors
All-in-one audio, video and power cable; Plug and Play ready
100 feet audio/video/power cable
Output type: BNC video, RCA audio & 2.1mm power connectors
For camera with DC power only
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 100ft Video Audio Power Cable BNC RCA CCTV Security Surveillance DVR Camera Cable Wire A27
